column4: hi, i was using rythmbox to copy music to my ipod and i found that for some reason my m4a files didnt play on the pod when i used it.  Then when i checked the conversion by playing the tracks off of my ipod from rythmbox they skipped intermitently and were bad quality.  Is there some better way to copy music over or is there a fix using rythmbox? any help would be apreciated
rhythmbox allows you to transfer files to ipod?
try that one...it might allow you to transfer the m4a files
